short_summary: Purchase of a Chromatographic Measuring Instrument Accessory, High Purity Nitrogen Gas Generator - E60PV-19EQUI
description: Old Nitroflow 60DNA chromatographic measuring instrument accessory requires replacement with a high purity nitrogen gas generator capable of supplying laboratory grade high purity (99.9%) nitrogen gas to 3 separate high pressure liquid chromatography (LC-MS/MS) systems.
duration_in_months: How will the minimum duration of the contract be specified?
